== Main inclusion report for libaio ==

=== Requirements ===

1. ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/liba/libaio/, compiled on all supported arches.

2. ''Rationale:'' library required by some proprietary applications.

3. ''Security:''
* No CANs.
* No Secunia record.
* The package is very young, so there is no real security history yet.
* No security relevant binaries.

4. ''QA:''
* Installation: only a library, no end user tool.
* Bugs: Debian bugs are fixed in ubuntu version, no relevant bugs reported upstream.
   NOTE: upstream bugzilla has bugs that are closed in our upstream version.
* No special hardware interaction.

5. ''Standards compliance:''
* Standard `debhelper` packaging.
* FHS met.
* Debian package and library policy met.
